transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes, good afternoon. Apeksha mein Kazi bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji bataiye, good afternoon.
Executive: Aapki call aayi thi na, wo mail ke regarding, aapko login nahi ho pa raha tha.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Wo aapka wo password wagera humne share kar diya tha. Abhi koi dikkat to nahi aa rahi hai na?
Customer: Abhi sir maine wo aapki mail hi nahi check kari hai. Main aapko check karke 10 minute mein revert karti hu, theek hai sir?
Executive: Ek baar check kar lijiye, aapko password na humne share kiya hai.
Customer: Achha theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, ek baar login karke na mujhe update kar dijiye.
Customer: Theek hai ji, sure, sure.
Executive: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Was previously unable to log in.


Resolution:

- Followed up on the login issue.
- Informed that the password was shared via email.


Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. Customer will check the email, attempt to log in, and revert in 10 minutes.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral

@@@Key Topics:
- login issue, password, email, follow-up
